role_definition: This Service Domain monitors the counterparty credit limits (CCL) used to govern trading activity to manage credit exposure. Note there may be regulatory requirements that determine allowed CCLs.
example_of_use: A trading desk checks a proposed trade against trading counterparty credit limits
executive_summary: This Service Domain monitors counterparty credit limits in the trading unit
key_features: Monitor limits and raise alerts against limit breaches
triggers: Trading Credit Position Measurement_ Analytics Object
